00041 void RequestHandlerMkdir::run() {
00042   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00043   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00044   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00045 
00046   try {
00047     const char *name = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00048 
00049     m_master->mkdir(&cb, m_session_id, name);
00050   }
00051   catch (Exception &e) {
00052     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00053     cb.error(e.code(), "Encoding problem with MKDIR message");
00054   }
00055 }
